fields.description:
Tam had originally set this up, but he is recommending this tool be dismantled.  I am adding this story to ensure no tools neglected, even those recommended for decommission.

Here is the email thread:

=====================================

Dan:

I am okay with decommissioning the server.  I do not for see us using this.

Regards,

Tam

 

*From:* Mehl, Cameron (FWQE) 
*Sent:* Monday, November 06, 2017 10:00 AM
*To:* Ross, Eric P (QxE FW & Solution Quality) <[eric.ross@hp.com|mailto:eric.ross@hp.com]>; Crossman, Dan (VCS R&D IT) <[dan.crossman@hp.com|mailto:dan.crossman@hp.com]>; Pham, Tam T <[tam.t.pham@hp.com|mailto:tam.t.pham@hp.com]>
*Cc:* Fritz, Terry M <[terry.fritz@hp.com|mailto:terry.fritz@hp.com]>
*Subject:* RE: mempool update

 

Adding in Tam as he originally wrote tools to leverage mapping it; there has been no transition setup for this yet so it is in a bit of a limbo while we figure out where it lands.

[@Pham, Tam T|mailto:tam.t.pham@hp.com]: Was this a server that you had owned at one point? Since R&D will own it, I want to check in and determine if an upgrade is ok for it. If you don’t own it, then please let me know so Terry and I can figure out where it should land and who should own it.

Cameron

 

*From:* Ross, Eric P (QxE FW & Solution Quality) 
*Sent:* Monday, November 6, 2017 9:44 AM
*To:* Crossman, Dan (VCS R&D IT) <[dan.crossman@hp.com|mailto:dan.crossman@hp.com]>
*Cc:* Fritz, Terry M <[terry.fritz@hp.com|mailto:terry.fritz@hp.com]>; Mehl, Cameron (FWQE) <[cameron.mehl@hp.com|mailto:cameron.mehl@hp.com]>
*Subject:* Re: mempool update

 

I don't own this anymore as it has been transferred to R&D.  Please contact Cameron and/or Terry.

 

*Eric Ross*
Analytics and Automation Architect

QxE FW & Solution Quality

 

Eric Ross <[eric.ross@hp.com|mailto:eric.ross@hp.com]>

PC Phone 1.360.212.9001
Hewlett-Packard Company
Vancouver, WA 98683
United States

 

*From:* Dan Crossman <[dan.crossman@hp.com|mailto:dan.crossman@hp.com]>
*Date:* Monday, November 6, 2017 at 9:17 AM
*To:* "Ross, Eric P (QxE FW & Solution Quality)" <[eric.ross@hp.com|mailto:eric.ross@hp.com]>
*Subject:* mempool update

 

Hi Eric - Roger’s asking to get mempool.vcs.rd.hpicorp.net upgraded to Ubuntu 14 asap.   Ubuntu 12 is getting flagged as insecure.

How would you like to proceed?   I’m happy to take it.

 

-dan

fields.summary: Tools used to mine and report on incoming telemetry data.
Private SSL/Server DigitalBadge for gen2hapier-van.vcs.rd.hpicorp.net expires on 15 Nov 2017.
fields.description: Need to renew the Private SSL/Server DigitalBadge for gen2hapier-van.vcs.rd.hpicorp.net for gen2hapier because it's expiring on 15 Nov 2017.

fields.summary: This is an example CR (a.k.a Bug).
fields.description: This is entered to demonstrate API retrieval of these kinds of issues.

fields.summary: Transfer test tools and utilities found in iws_tests, iws_tools
fields.description:
Test Tool directories:
iws_tests/Print/external/Test_Tools
iws_tools/qe_tools/Print/internal/Test_Tools
More tools directories may be present

Tools should be moved in to git hub enterprise, and an owner for the new repos needs to be determined.
George Harder is developingn a web service for capturing CDM telemetry data.

fields.summary: Determine ownership for maintaining Vancouver/Singapore Cicada servers
Determine ownership for eprtest01 (See Eric for more details)
Transfer ownership and support of the FW update staging servers.
fields.description: fwstaging-int.vcd.hp.com and fwstaging.vcd.hp.com are used across HP for testing workflows that include FW updates via the network.    This is a simple Apache server containerized in Docker and can easily be moved and/or replicated.

The requirements for SAS in R&D will be dramatically different and may cause SAS to drift away from what we will need in QxE.  It is expected that the primary ownership and support for the tool will be in R&D but at the same time, someone in QxE needs to be the "primary customer" for this section.

This assumes that QxE still needs dummynet for certain types of testing.  Therefore, this would be a shared resource with R&D.  We need to identify who is the owner of this for liaison purposes with IT.

fields.summary: Ensure FW release sharing continues to be supported.
fields.description: Today there is someone in Beyondsoft (Tony?) that manually copies the latest firmware releases to \\rndhub.vcs.rd.hpicorp.net\fwshare and a regular basis.  Until we have full featured FW artifact distribution system, this will need to continue to be supported.

fields.summary: Transfer ownership/support of fwqenfs to R&D
fields.description:
This is an NFS file share that is used for:
 * As a back end for the Samba/Windows file shares used test operators on Windows.
 * As a way to instantly get access to the tests on the SALQE VM without having to do the time consuming git clone.
 * As the staging point for publishing SAL libraries and generating SAL pydocs.

There are a collection of scripts that are constantly doing git pulls on various repos.

fields.summary: Determine ownership and support for each of the CouchDB databases.
fields.description: Under the QxE the data architecture is still TBD.  CouchDB may or may not have a future in that environment.  In the meantime, continued support of the existing DB systems is required. At the moment only [~eric.ross@hp.com] and Andy Wilde are trained for this role.  Most of the data itself will be owned by R&D

fields.summary: Transfer SAL libraries and tool chain to R&D
fields.description: There are several libraries contained in SAL with each in a separate Github Enterprise repo.  Also associated with this is a tool chain that runs that validates and publishes the libraries to salx.vcd.hp.com and pypi.vcd.hp.com.  Cameron was most recently involved with this and is familiar with the tool chain.

fields.summary: Transfer support of iws_tests, iws_tools, iws_testdata, and iws_testdata2 to R&D
fields.description: These are the primary repos containing tests and test print files.  It is expected that these will probably be deprecated after tests are refactored for automation.
This is a site that included the python docs for the SAL libraries.  There is an associated tool chain that generates these docs.  Cameron was most recently involved in supporting this chain.

[https://saldb06.vcs.rd.hpicorp.net/uidash] which was created by Jay Yang should be transferred to the appropriate owner.  Some instruction on the system configuration and CouchDB will be needed to achieve this transfer.

fields.summary: Identify and transfer tools that will be owned and supported by R&D

fields.description:
# Create Program level transition plan
 # Seek feedback from Alva's staff and R&D
 # Align the plan and communicate it to Alva's staff and R&D, then to ICs.
 # Track transition activities

fields.summary: Create and process SoW's and PO's for FY18
fields.description:
Requires QxE / R&D SoW splits for BYS
 * Generate top down and bottom's up estimates for FY18 programs
 * Split according to agreements and generate PO's
 * Get SoW's signed and input PO's for approval

Extend Pactera PO's for Q1 during transition period

Allion - Transfer certification SoW/PO to Roman, Open SoW/PO for developers

WiPro - Analyze long-term plan and likely extend for Q1.
